columns.name: _ts
columns.description: Contains system-managed version information
columns.caption: _ts

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: Contains the user who originally created this job record
columns.caption: Created By

columns.name: Created
columns.description: Contains the time at which this job was created
columns.caption: Created

columns.name: ModifiedBy
columns.description: Contains the user who last modified this job record
columns.caption: Modified By

columns.name: Modified
columns.description: Contains the time at which this job record was modified
columns.caption: Modified

columns.name: EntityId
columns.description: Contains a unique entity id
columns.caption: Entity Id

columns.name: RowId
columns.description: Contains an auto-incrementing id
columns.caption: Row Id

columns.name: Status
columns.description: Contains the short status of this job, such as WAITING, ERROR, or COMPLETE
columns.caption: Status

columns.name: Info
columns.description: Contains status information about this job, most frequently an error message if the job failed
columns.caption: Info

columns.name: FilePath
columns.description: Contains the path to the log file for this job
columns.caption: File Path

columns.name: Email
columns.description: Contains email addresses for notification on job success or failure
columns.caption: Email

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Contains a short description of this job, often including file and/or analysis protocol names
columns.caption: Description

columns.name: DataUrl
columns.description: Contains a URL where the results of this job are available for display
columns.caption: Data Url

columns.name: Job
columns.description: Contains an internal entity id reference to the job, used to manage communication within the system and with external systems
columns.caption: Job

columns.name: Provider
columns.description: Contains the name of the PipelineProvider that created this job
columns.caption: Provider

columns.name: HadError
columns.description: Indicates if this job has failed at some point in the past
columns.caption: Had Error

columns.name: JobParent
columns.description: Contains the entityId for the parent of this job, if any
columns.caption: Job Parent

columns.name: JobStore
columns.description: Contains a serialized XML description of this job
columns.caption: Job Store

columns.name: ActiveTaskId
columns.description: Contains a pipeline-configuration identifier for the active task in the sequence of tasks
columns.caption: Active Task Id

columns.name: ActiveHostName
columns.description: The assigned server for jobs in a RUNNING state. NULL for local webserver jobs, an arbitrary value for locations handled by remote servers
columns.caption: Active Host Name

columns.name: Folder
columns.description: Contains this job's project or folder
columns.caption: Folder

description: Contains one row per pipeline job
title: Job

columns.caption: Description

columns.caption: Info
